alert.note: Alert for Ford (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 01 at 7:10PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Ford County through 800 PM CDT... At 710 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Spearville, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Wright around 730 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Dodge City and Ft. Dodge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
